cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of intrusion detection systems to prevent DDoS attacks in cloud computing, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also mentions the use of routers and network infrastructure, which suggests a focus on networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Additionally, the paper discusses the distributed nature of cloud computing, which could fall under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also mentions the use of algorithms for detection and confirmation, which could fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE) or artificial intelligence (cs.SI).
